name: Intruders
description:
This game was inspired by "Five Nights at Freddy's" by Scott Cawthon and "Welcome to the Game II" by Reflect Studios.

You got kidnapped and just woke up in an unknown place. After a quick look, you find a note that says: "Survive five nights and we will leave". Then you see a table with a laptop on it but there is nothing but a static on the screen. You tried to interact with it but nothing was happening. Then you find a flashlight near the laptop. But keep in mind that it's pretty weak and its power is limited. That flashlight will help you defend yourself against several intruders, so be very careful with its resources. After you explore the house for a bit you find a couple of cupboards that you can hide in:

After you explored the basement you found the breaker and turned it on. When you got out of the basement you heard strange noises coming from upstairs. After an investigation, it turn out that it was just a radio in the room where you woke up. Then you try to interact with the laptop again. As soon as you touch the laptop the static goes away and now you see that this is a camera system.

After a couple of minutes, you hear knocking at the door...

Features

- 3 Antagonists with different mechanics;
- Camera system;
- Hiding mechanics;
- Horror events like breaker turning off with several consequences;
- Challenges;
